description: A must-have for your Christmas table, try this eye-catching raspberry and cherry lamington trifle to impress guests and have them coming back for more.
name: Cherry & Raspberry Lamington Trifle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Woolworths lamington bar cakes, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare jelly according to packet instructions. Allow to cool slightly. Pour jelly into a 4L capacity trifle bowl. Carefully drop in pitted cherries and half of the raspberries. Refrigerate for 6 hours or until set.

Meanwhile, place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, or until melted and smooth. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Spread a thin layer of chocolate over baking paper. Loosely roll baking paper from 1 short side, then refrigerate until required.

Place pudding mix, cocoa, milk and half of the cream in the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with a whisk attachment. Whisk on medium speed for 1 minute or until mixture is thick and smooth. Place remaining cream and icing sugar in a another mixing bowl, then beat for 2 minutes or until soft peaks form.
Layer lamington over set jelly. Spoon over pudding mixture. Dollop over cream mixture and decorate with remaining raspberries, cherries and chocolate shards.
